hero.title: A New Way of Luxury Living
hero.subtitle: Cala Blanca Residences · Sitges
hero.description: An exclusive collection of homes where comfort, architecture and the Mediterranean coexist in harmony.

welcome.title: Welcome to Cala Blanca Residences
paragraphs: A new development property by AX Partners in La Plana, one of the best areas of Sitges, designed for those who value space, natural light and tranquility.
A collection of 29 homes, distributed in two carefully designed buildings, with spacious and open interiors, terraces and private gardens in an unbeatable setting.
Homes with 2 to 4 bedrooms, high-quality finishes and architecture designed to offer comfort, elegance and well-being.

sections.title: Passivhaus
sections.tagline: A Home that Cares for You and the Environment
sections.description: Cala Blanca Residences has been designed under Passivhaus standards, guaranteeing minimal energy consumption together with high interior comfort.
features: High performance thermal and acoustic insulation
Domestic hot water production using aerothermal energy

sections.title: Common Areas
sections.description: A residential environment where every common space has been carefully designed to foster community living and the well-being of all residents.
features: Chill out rooftop with views and water feature

sections.title: Interiors
sections.description: Bright and functional interiors, where every detail has been selected to create an atmosphere of comfort and timeless elegance.
features: Open kitchen to living dining room

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Sitges · Mediterranean in its Purest Form
location.description: Just 30 minutes from Barcelona, Sitges is an elegant and sophisticated coastal enclave, surrounded by the Garraf natural park and known for its Mediterranean lifestyle.

distances.beach: A few minutes from the beach and Sitges center
distances.services: Close to international schools and services

location.mapAlt: Location map of Cala Blanca Residences in Sitges
poi: Church of Sant Bartomeu and Santa Tecla

houses.title: Development Units
houses.disclaimer: (*) VAT must be added to these prices at the rate in force at the time of accrual. The current rate is 10%.
houses.includes: All units include a parking space and a storage room in the price.

contact.title: Cala Blanca Residences
contact.intro: A perfect balance between architecture, comfort and surroundings. A new way of living in an apartment without giving up luxury.
contact.subtitle: Leave your contact to access the Private Sale process.

calculator.disclaimer: Remember that banks usually require a minimum contribution of 10% plus expenses.
